question: Which of the following built Akbar's mausoleum at Sikandra?
explanation: The Mughal emperor Jahangir built Akbar's mausoleum at Sikandra. He also built the tomb of ltimad-ud-Daula, his father-in-law, at Agra. The tomb of ltimad-ud- I Daula was the first Mughal monument which was built entirely of marble.
